0.caption: Home
0.content:
OUR VISION

Our children are the future leaders and we as patriotic citizens seek to give these children equal rights and hope as enshrined in the constitution of Ghana.
New Grace Foundation is taking the lead to search for the deprived children and attend to their basic needs. Our facilities are very new and comfortable to provide a good atmosphere for studies and livelihood.   

What we do

Committed to provide education, vocation and welfare to "helpless" and underprivileged children

SUPPORT US

Can you help us in kind or in cash? You can also help in volunteering  in our upcoming activities.

CONTACT US

If you have a question or would like to get involved, we’d love to hear from you.

12.caption: About
12.content:
About

New Grace Foundation (NGF) was founded on 18th October, 2016 to help “helpless” and underprivileged children in Ghana. It is charitable, voluntary, humanitarian, non-governmental, non-profit, non-political and nonpartisan organization committed to providing hope, health, education, vocation and security to “helpless” and underprivileged children living in deprived areas in Ghana.
12.name: about
12.author: BillionThemesAdmin

16.caption: Events
16.content:
Parties &
Special Events

We offer themed birthday parties that include art lessons and celebration time! The choice of themes include: drawing, painting, printmaking, mask-making, mixed media and clay. Birthday parties can be scheduled Thursday through Sunday.

country style

We work together with a professional agency, who for the past 15 years has handled thousands of documents for couples wishing to get married in the Dominican Republic.  Write to us to get more information about the requirements and costs.

Read More

classic style

We can reserve the best restaurants, luxury villas, boutique hotels in most areas of the Dominican Republic at the lowest rates for your special day. Our team has the ability to perform ceremonies on the best and the most secluded beaches of the country.
